body: i’m thankful for d and my marriage to d, that i took a mental health day today because i really needed it, even though it was hard to do it and i know tomorrow will be hard too, and that when i took miso out before  bed she peed and we made it back inside seconds before the heavy rain started falling, a small miracle.
normalized_markdown: i’m thankful for d and my marriage to d, that i took a mental health day today because i really needed it, even though it was hard to do it and i know tomorrow will be hard too, and that when i took miso out before  bed she peed and we made it back inside seconds before the heavy rain started falling, a small miracle.
